org.nd4j.linalg.api.buffer

Class BaseDataBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.api.buffer.BaseDataBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DataBuffer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseCudaDataBuffer, CompressedDataBuffer, DoubleBuffer, FloatBuffer, IntBuffer, LongBuffer

    public abstract class BaseDataBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataBuffer
    Base class for a data buffer handling basic byte operations among other things.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isConstant

        public boolean isConstant()
        This method returns whether this DataBuffer is constant, or not. Constant buffer means that it modified only during creation time, and then it stays the same for all lifecycle. I.e. used in shape info databuffers.
        Specified by:
        isConstant in interface DataBuffer
